name: The Hourglass Tale
description:
The Hourglass Tale is a 3D platform game and it contains puzzles that must be solved by the player.

It was developed for GameDev.tv Community Jam.

This time, the Jam's theme is about time! So we thought that in this game the player manipulates time in order to solve the puzzles and complete all levels. 

It looks simple, but it can be tricky and the player has to find his or her own way to achieve the level's goal, that is reaching the portal.

Run, jump, freeze the time, die, run, jump, freeze the time, die, do it all again...

We really hope you enjoy our game!

Instructions

Use AWSD in order to move the player e press space to jump.

Press E in order to stop the time.

Press P to pause.
